feed.title: SAP Community - SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central
feed.subtitle: SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Codes in drop-down lists or fields Latest People Profile
entry.content:
Hello SAP community. We are configuring the new user profile that will soon be universal in the first half of 2026. However, as customers, we are experiencing poor performance when viewing data in drop-down list fields.

There, we are seeing the code for the list value, such as addresses, country, department, mail type, etc.

Is there any way to make these codes invisible, considering that we have enabled viewing the codes in the new people profile, but it is required for: Position number, job classification code, company number, etc.?

Has anyone else experienced the same issue?

Best regards,

entry.title: Cannot access Hands-on Practice System for SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Core Academy
entry.content:
I cannot access the link for the Hands-on Practice System for SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Core Academy. I was just using the hands-on practice system doing some exercises and after some time of idle, the session expired and had to log in again but the site automatically closed when I try to log in. Then, It brought me back to the access page for the hands-on practice system but it just shows a 404 error page. 

I tried accessing it through the lists of practice systems in my profile, the 2 systems that I was currently enrolled to was shown to the list but when I clicked the "see practice system" it just brings me to the search page of the hands-on practice systems of sap. Then, I tried searching it there, but its gone on the list. Only 1 SuccessFactors Employee Central hands-on practice system was listed.

entry.title: Sending Emails to Personal Email id / Sending multiple emails to same recipient in Workflow CC
entry.content:
We need to configure email notifications upon workflow completion with the following conditions for a few use cases:

  1. Send emails dynamically to the employee’s personal email address once the workflow is completed.
  2. Send multiple email templates to the same recipient (external email ID) when the workflow is completed.

Are there any options in SAP SuccessFactors to configure as per the above conditions?

entry.title: BIB Query IT0001 WS_4
entry.content:
We are using BIB query to fetch data from EC to HCM only for IT0002 Personal Data, IT0006 Address and Communication IT105.

WS_4, IT0001 is a mandatory template, how can we exclude this from data replication. 

it is causing issues and deleting IT0001 records.

entry.title: Successfactors - Custom MDF - Unique Identifier
entry.content:
Hi All,

We require a system-generated unique identifier for each record created in a custom MDF object related to Travel. This identifier must be assigned only at the time of record creation and must remain unchanged during subsequent edits or workflow updates. We explored multiple approaches but encountered the following limitations:

  1. A Save Rule was implemented at the object level, using a custom field to store the identifier. However, this resulted in the identifier being regenerated on every record edit or upon workflow completion.

  2. UI Rules were evaluated, but they do not support the generation of sequential or system-controlled unique identifiers.

  3. The externalCode field was configured as a String to manually control the identifier; however, this prevented the object from being associated with the Latest People Profile.

Seeking expert advise to handle this scenario.

Thanks in advance.

Thanks

entry.title: Can we block position Update if done with the wrong Effective Date ?
entry.content:
we have identified a situation where employees are not correctly replicated because

Position is updated in Position Org Chart just after an employee has been rehired on these specific position.

If the position Effective Date = Rehire Date then Replication is blocked until the Rehire date is effective.

These is preventing 30d prior arrival creation in many third party systems.

After investigating these issue, it seems the only option available is to create an admin alert (Position Follow-Up Admin Alert.)to the employee updating the position (HR)  in order to tell him to correct the effective date of the position change to be greater than rehire date.

These means : 

HR rehire on Position X user A on Jan 20th 

HR updates with effective date Jan 20th the position 

Position updates is replicated in futur-records in job information.

The business rule to trigger the admin alert is only configured at the job information level, when correction have to occure in both :

- position 

- job information

to have a clean employee record.

it's rather complex setup to configure  admin alerts and there is high risk that HR doesn't go to Admin Alert and see the problem.

it would make more sense if we could execute a validation in Position Org Chart to compare position Start Date & incumbent Start Date. if these 2 dates are identical, we could have an error message, which blocks any wrong data to be entered on the system and forces correct date > rehire date to be entered.

but so far

entry.title: Compensation Review and External Users
entry.content:
Hello, i was hoping to get some advice on, if possible, we have a sister company that does not have an org structure or employees in EC. Through an organisational transformation we have some teams that report into the main company, and managers who will perform the remuneration review within the main company i.e. employee in P&C employed by sister company, report into manager in main company. 

Is it possible to upload a flat file for these employees in the sister company to include them in the workbooks for the remuneration review for the manager?

entry.title: With full profile the pay stub is opening in a new tab. Is there a workaround or a custom solution
entry.content:
With full profile the pay stub is opening in a new tab. This creates a security risk on shared retail store devices.

Is there a workaround or a custom solution that we can implement to force the pay stub open in the same tab? Can the redirect link be configured to open in the same tab?

entry.title: Need to assign a time profile to the Global Assignment record in the host country but error
entry.content:
Need to assign a time profile to the Global Assignment record in the host country but following error is displayed:

Business Rule FlexibleAccountStartDate_Sick Leave cannot determine the Flexible Account Start Date for account type ZAF_SICK_TAT. Please take a look at the rule or temporarily remove the time information from the job information.
I looked at the rule and it has not changed since go live in 2019.
The rule worked until November 2025 when suddenly, we cannot amend the Time Profile on Job Information portlet.

entry.title: SAP SuccessFactors Story report- Attendance report
entry.content:
Hi all,

I have a query regarding a story report. The client is asking for a report that shows the attendance time records which have been approved and successfully replicated to the  ECP system. How can we configure the report to display this information?

I have already generated the attendance report ; only this one requirement is still pending.

I need the ECP replication status included in the report.

I would appreciate your support in addressing this.

Thank you.

entry.title: Administer Time off/ leave amount to all employees in bulk in a dnamic way
entry.content: I am trying to administer time off for all employees in bulk using a dynamic approach, rather than processing it individually. Is there a way to do this at once while still assigning different time off days to specific employees or groups of employees?

entry.title: 'Select All' fields option in the Story Report
entry.content:
Currently, when generating a story report, there is no option to select all fields, neither at the Query Designer, nor at the Add Dimensions section for either the Rows or Columns areas. Each field added from the data source must be selected individually (manually) in the Add Dimensions section for it to appear in the report.

There should be a ‘Select All’ fields option available at the top of the field selection list within the Query Designer and at Add Dimensions section. This would allow users to select all fields at once when needed, while still preserving the option to manually select/deselect individual fields.

Implementing this functionality would greatly benefit users who create, modify, or enhance Story reports, ultimately improving overall user experience. If you feel the same, I would request you to vote for the customer influence idea:

https://influence.sap.com/sap/ino/#/idea/357089 

#SuccessFactors #StoryReports #Analytics SAP SuccessFactors Platform @Anvesh_Sankoori

entry.title: Employee Central Global Benefits - Wallet Functionality
entry.content:
We are looking the EC Global Benefits module for a client and want to investigate the Wallet functionality in more detail.

The client has a requirement to have a Flex Credit/Bank setup for employees to purchase additional coverages for insurance and pension. This credit is calculated as a percentage of their annual salary and an additional requirement is to have remaining balances moved to the employees health spending account at the end of open enrolment.

We are trying to understand if the Wallet functionality can support this type of requirement in the Global Benefits module and to see if there's additional material on how to implement the wallet functionality.
